alert.note: Alert for Kingfisher; Logan; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 11:19PM CDT until May 13 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN KINGFISHER...LOGAN AND SOUTHWESTERN PAYNE COUNTIES... At 1119 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Kingfisher to 3 miles northwest of Coyle to 4 miles southeast of Lake Carl Blackwell, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Guthrie, Kingfisher, Langston, Crescent, Cashion, Dover, Coyle, Cedar Valley, Mulhall, Cimarron City, Orlando, Lake Carl Blackwell, Lovell, and Omega. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
